thread.title: susan shepherd
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by susan shepherd

author: susan shepherd
title: susan shepherd
text:
I am delighted with my Barber Jacket. Great price from Country Attire.The only downside is that the sleeves are rather tight so I ordered a size larger than I usually take.
The delivery was amazing. Very fast. I was keep informed about delivery times by text. Very impressive. I recommended Country Attire to my friend and my daughter
